children.text: Quick Start Guide
Click on an item to start typing (Edit Mode).
Press `Esc` to stop editing and enter Navigation (View) Mode.
Press `Enter` in Edit Mode to split an item or create a new one.
Press `Shift+Enter` to create a new line within an item.
Key Features
Modes: Separate View and Edit modes for streamlined navigation without accidental typing.
Zoom In: Click a bullet point to focus on that item and its children.
Zoom Out: Use the breadcrumbs at the top or press `Ctrl+Up` to go back.
Expand/Collapse: Click the triangle next to an item to show or hide its children.
Daily Log: Press `Ctrl+J` to jump directly to a special section for today's date.
Quick Find: Press `Ctrl+Shift+K` to open the search bar.
All Hotkeys
Edit Mode
Esc : Switch to View Mode
Enter : Create a new item or split the current one
Shift+Enter : Add a new line within the current item
Tab : Indent current item
Shift+Tab : Outdent current item
Ctrl+L : Turn selected text into a link
[[ : Start typing to link to another item
Arrow Keys : Move text cursor only
View Mode (Navigation)
Enter : Switch to Edit Mode
Up/Down Arrow : Navigate between items
Left Arrow : Go to parent (or collapse if expanded)
Right Arrow : Expand item or go to first child
Ctrl+Left Arrow : Fold focused bullet and all children
Ctrl+Right Arrow : Unfold focused bullet and all children
Ctrl+Down (or Zoom Icon) : Zoom In
Ctrl+Up : Zoom Out
Organizing (Both Modes)
Alt+Up Arrow : Move item up
Alt+Down Arrow : Move item down
Changelog
Version 0.1.38: Standalone Build
Rebuilt application as a standalone index.html file with all components included.
Version 0.1.37: Critical Bug Fixes
Fixed a JSON syntax error (malformed structure) in the help documentation that prevented it from loading.
Version 0.1.36: Documentation Fixes
Fixed a JSON syntax error in the help documentation file that prevented it from loading correctly.
Version 0.1.35: Sidebar Font Match
The sidebar content now uses the same font color (gray/white) and font family as the main outline items, ensuring visual consistency.
Sidebar headers (Favorites/Recents) retain the theme color to distinguish them as UI elements.
Version 0.1.34: Sidebar Colors
The sidebar now uses the user-defined main theme color for text, matching the app toolbar.
Version 0.1.33: Sidebar Styling
Updated the sidebar font and color to match the main outline for a cleaner, more consistent look.
Removed the smaller font size constraint from the sidebar.
Version 0.1.32: UI & Navigation Improvements
Improved Edit Mode navigation: Arrow keys now reliably stick to the focused bullet unless modifiers are used.
View Mode: `Ctrl+Left` recursively folds an item and all children; `Ctrl+Right` unfolds all.
View Mode: Standard `Left/Right` keys now only affect the immediate item's folding state.
Sidebar text color now matches the main outline for better consistency.
Version 0.1.31: Bug Fixes
Fixed a script error caused by truncated build generation.
Version 0.1.30: Folding & Navigation Tweaks
Added `Ctrl+Left` and `Ctrl+Right` hotkeys in View Mode for recursive folding/unfolding of the entire subtree.
Standard `ArrowLeft` and `ArrowRight` (and the fold icon) now only toggle the specific item's state, preserving child states.
Restricted Arrow Key navigation in Edit Mode to stay within the current bullet's text (unless using Esc to exit).
Sidebar text now uses the main theme color and a slightly smaller font size.
Version 0.1.29: Fixes
Fixed a script error caused by incomplete build generation.
Version 0.1.28: Layout & Hotkey Adjustments
Reinstated `Ctrl+Down` (Zoom In) and `Ctrl+Up` (Zoom Out) hotkeys in View Mode.
Moved the status bar to the bottom of the viewport, spanning the full width of the application.
Version 0.1.27: Focus & Stability Fixes
Fixed a critical ReferenceError in the standalone application build.
Improved focus restoration when switching from Edit to View mode.
Added keyboard shortcuts (Arrows, Enter) to View mode for smoother navigation.
